programme.desc: Opposites attract. And so they say. When the saintly, introverted Quinito meets the candid, out-going Trixie, there are no sparks flying to great heavens. In fact, both think that there’s just no way they can ever click.

programme.title: Blondie
programme.desc: Lorna (Ilonah Jean) and her friends are gripped in fear as a serial killer is on the loose. But a pattern soon emerges. The victims are all men and a girl in blood wig is seen fleeing the scene of the crime.

programme.title: Ipagpatawad Mo
programme.desc: They were the ideal couple and seemed to lead the perfect life. But their son was not like the other normal children. How they came to terms with the presence of their autistic child in their lives, is the gist of this wonderfully crafted film.

programme.title: Kamagong (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Arnis, the ancient Filipino martial art, took center stage in this coming of age drama wherein a young boy perfected his skills and his idol rediscovered what it takes to be a man.

programme.title: Kasalanan Bang Sambahin Ka
programme.desc: As a last fling before getting married, Alex (Julio Diaz) dates his friend's cousin Catherine (Vivian Velez). When Alex still marries his fiancee Grace (Dawn Zulueta), Catherine makes life difficult by creating a scandal.

programme.title: Somewhere (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: A popular singer who was also the daughter of a judge was kidnapped by a convict he once sentenced to jail. But the act of revenge reversed itself when Lorna fell in love with her kind and caring captor.

programme.title: Silang Matatapang (Walang Atras Sa Laban)
programme.desc: Raymond Bagatsing is set to plunge headstrong into this action picture. His voluptuous real life girlfriend, Shirley Fuentes, is part of the cast in this slambang action movie.

programme.title: Bad Boy (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: This was the landmark film that launched Robin Padilla to stardom as one of the biggest action stars in the Philippine cinema. Robin played a young man branded as \"bad boy\" for life because as a kid he killed his father in defense of his mother.

programme.title: Trabaho Lang Dear, Walang Personalan
programme.desc: Former carnival workers Leo and Amanda were trying to make a living by doing all sorts of jobs. From Dyesebel and Babaing Gagamba, Amanda was now a security guard by day and a nightclub bunny by night.

programme.title: Ngayon at Kailanman
programme.desc: Ayra (Sharon Cuneta), an heiress who came home to bury her dead father and who later discovered that her family's estate had been taken over by Edwin (Richard Gomez), her childhood sweetheart and the son of their former overseer.

programme.title: Dobol Trobol
programme.desc: Nino and Hero were dutiful, loyal cops. They were also inept and were the main headaches of the police force of Baguio City. It was the luck of these bumblers, though, to stumble on a major case which had its origins in China.

programme.title: SPO4 Santiago (Sharpshooter)
programme.desc: Bong Revilla, Jr, starred in this exciting film based on the real-life exploits of SPO4 Jimmy Santiago, SWAT member and sharp-shooter, who was idolized by the masses because he relentlessly went after hostage takers, hold-uppers and all sorts of criminals.

programme.title: The Sarah Balabagan Story
programme.desc: All her life, she has known how it is to be poor. So at a tender age, she gives up her youth and flies off to a far country to earn the money that she hopes will lift her family from privation.

programme.title: Ikaw
programme.desc: The song, Ikaw, is the backdrop of this touching melodrama about a young composer and the love of his life. Sharon played a doctor who always decided using her head while Ariel was a composer who put his heart into everything he did.

programme.title: Bakit Bughaw Ang Langit?
programme.desc: Why is the sky blue? Why do we love the people we love? These are questions no one can answer. Because is just is.

programme.title: Manchichiritchit
programme.desc: The reigning Queen of Comedy, Maricel Soriano, met rapper-comedian Andrew E in this delightful tale about con artists getting a heart of gold.

programme.title: Wooly Booly (Ang Classmate Kong Alien)
programme.desc: Wooly Booly was an alien stranded on earth. A family took him in and a request to his superiors from another planet granted him an almost human appearance.

programme.title: Si Maryo O Si Goko
programme.desc: Loony William Martinez stars as your COMPU-WHACKO THRILL-SEEKER who entered into a series of hell-raising misadventures that will take the viewers to the outskirts of computer-generated fantasia.

programme.title: Forever
programme.desc: Mikee had led a charmed life. Now she was engaged to marry the man who was considered by her rich parents as the most suitable for their daughter. But Mikee wanted more out of life.
